...It was a night like no other.%K%P
Apparently people had been drawn by her voice\nand they had stopped to listen.%K%P
I found this out later while using the net.%K%P
The two of us had stood there, ignoring the world,\nenjoying a show just for us.%K%P
No one knew if it was real or not.%K%P
They had no way to find out,\nand we didn't care either way.%K%P
Sara had found her voice again\nand we had expressed our love.%K%P
That was good enough for us.%K%P
'I see, so that's what was going on...'%K%P
We had been a little slow at it, but we finally told\nShuri and Kagura the truth about Sara's retirement.%K%P
'Sorry I hadn't talked with you about it.'%K%P
'No, it's okay.\nIt was right before the auditions, so I'm sure\nyou were just looking out for us.'%K%P
Thankfully they seemed to understand.%K%P
They were actually quite sympathetic\nand didn't seem angry at all.%K%P
'But, not being able to sing...\nI can't even begin to imagine.'%K%P
'I guess that just means that being a Divine Idol\ntakes some serious mental fortitude.\nWe'll have to be ready, Kagura.'%K%P
'I'll be fine as long as you're around, Shuri!'%K%P
'There you go again...'%K%P
Working together as a duo had really deepened\nthe bonds between them.%K%P
'Heehee, you two really have grown close, huh?'%K%P
'What? Us? Oh, no... This is just normal, right?'%K%P
'But look who's talking, Sara...\nYou've been literally stuck to Yamato lately.'%K%P
'Ahaha, sorry guys...'%K%P
We explained everything. Not just about her,\nbut also about us.%K%P
Apparently finding out about us was more of a shock\nthan Sara being unable to sing.%K%P
'But hey, is it really okay for you to date, Sara?'%K%P
'It would be difficult if she was still in\nL☆SEVEN, but...'%K%P
'Yeah. I'm not an Divine Idol anymore.'%K%P
'No matter how lovey-dovey we get,\nno one can complain!'%K%P
She grabbed onto my arm as she spoke.%K%P
'Hey now, Sara!'%K%P
'Geez. You're gonna have all the customers talking.'%K%P
'Ah, don't worry about it.'%K%P
'I'll never be a Divine Idol again anyway.'%K%P
Since she found her voice again,\nthe option was open to her.%K%P
But she decided not to choose it.%K%P
'I'll let you in on my plan.'%K%P
'I'm thinking of being a singer-songwriter.'%K%P
The sound of her guitar rang out through the store.%K%P
The notes of her guitar gently resounded.%K%P
'La-la-la...'%K%P
'How's the song coming along?'%K%P
'Alright, I guess.\nSorry for playing here, of all places.'%K%P
'It's fine. You always help out anyway.\nAnd my parents keep saying they can't\nthank you enough.'%K%P
Sara started coming by more often than before.%K%P
She said it was because she needed to be able\nto see me in order to write her songs.%K%P
'You know, I never realized it until I lost my voice.\nBut I deeply, truly, love music.'%K%P
'Is that why you decided to give up being a\nDivine Idol to be a singer-songwriter?'%K%P
'Being with L☆SEVEN was fun, but I was only\nsinging songs made by other people.'%K%P
'Now I know how fun it is to sing your own songs\nwith your own feelings.'%K%P
'I could never go back to being an idol again.'%K%P
I was sure she still missed those days.%K%P
But she kept her eyes forward,\nfocused only on her new dream.%K%P
'Are you worried...?'%K%P
'Nope.'%K%P
'As long as I have you, I'll be fine.'%K%P
'This will all be new for me...\nBut will you help me through it?'%K%P
'Of course.\nI will be a Sara Benzaiten fan till the end of days.'%K%P
'That's nice and all, but 'fan'??'%K%P
'You're my one and only love!'%K%P
